txt.en: 'You have done much already for the People of the Avanc, and you have survived all of the challenges my men and I presented you. I am impressed.\n\n'You may go and speak with the Elders. Tell them that you have my respect and gratitude. They will be able to help you more with the duvodiad you seek.'
'It is time that we spoke, [placeholder]. We have been keeping watch on you, and you have proven good to the Avanc-lûth. It is time that we spoke of some of the secrets of Dunbog.'
'You should speak with the Elders at Lhan Rhos.'
The hunters are very impressed with your work. You have earned the respect of the Avanc-lûth Elders, and they wish to speak with you about the plight of the Dunbog.
Talk to Elder Déin at Lhan Rhos
Lhan Rhos is to the north-west of the hunters' camp.\n\nHarri has asked you to return to the village of Lhan Rhos and speak with the Elders there.
